data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Cabinda, Angola from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cabinda, Angola
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Cabinda who will make disciples who make disciples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Cabinda to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, convict the 159,112 believers in Cabinda to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Chinese, general people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Chinese, general people.
Lord, help the people of Cabinda, Angola to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Jesus, make the 472,133 people in the state of Cabinda who claim to know you, brave enough to let the Bible weigh their thoughts and intentions today.
data.verse: For the word of God is living and powerful, and sharper than any two-edged sword, piercing even to the division of soul and spirit, and of joints and marrow, and is a discerner of the thoughts and intents of the heart.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Cabinda, Angola with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

location.name: Cabinda
location.people_groups_list: Simaa-Makoma, Holu, Masi, Heikum, Pygmy, Bakwe
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Simaa-Makoma (3,700), Holu (54,000), Masi (300), Heikum (1,600), Pygmy, Bakwe (23,000)
